website_summaries.verdict: While it earns a lot of praise for the rich color and nice results it produces for many users, it also comes with some concerns.
pros: A versatile dye kit that can be used on eyebrows and eyelashes
Affordable – a complete kit that includes enough product for 12 applications
cons: Some reports of it not mixing very well and causing a burning sensation on the skin
May need to be applied several times for preferred results

customer_reviews.title: Lashes and brows!
customer_reviews.text: At first I bought it just for my eyelashes, but once I saw how well it worked I got a brown one for my brows as well. Here is a before during and after picture of my eyebrows. Because I'm so fair-skinned I only left it on my eyebrows for 5 minutes, worked out well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Completely ineffective
customer_reviews.text: After my long-term brow coloring product had changed and was no longer as effective, I decided to try this product. Wish I hadn’t wasted my money. The coloring product is a paste and you activate it with some drops that are the consistency of water. The product does not mix effectively and it’s difficult to work with. I used it on my very blonde brows per the instructions and you could not tell I even dyed them after the product was wiped off. Thinking it was operator error, I did it a couple more times after the next couple of days...same results. The remainder of the box went into the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon S

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried this twice to give it a chance. I thought maybe I didn’t get the proportions right the first time, or didn’t leave it on long enough. It still didn’t work. The dye comes out of the tube lumpy, and doesn’t mix with the developer into a smooth consistency. I left it on double the time and still had barely a change. First pic is before and second is after application. Don’t bother with this product. Buy the Geodfrey brand instead. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: jendoesgym

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend especially for natural blondes and redheads
customer_reviews.text: I am a natural redhead so my eyebrows and eyelashes are completely bleached blonde naturally and you cannot see them so every day I would have to put on mascara and fill in my eyebrows or I would pay to go to an aesthetician to get this done at a price of $60 for the same results well worth it only needed very little amount and it applied very easily there was no strong fumes No irritation and I have sensitive skin no burning of the eyes excellent product highly recommend still have an entire thing left so it will last long time
customer_reviews.author: Jodi P

customer_reviews.title: Watch YouTube Tutorials!
customer_reviews.text: I watched so many YouTube tutorials on how to use this product even before buying it - especially because there are different colors to choose from. The tutorials really helped to guide the process of application and also how much dye to use depending on how dark you want to go
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Excellent color/tint for lashes and brows. The coverage for stubborn thick grey intruders is amazing and long lasting. If you are using just for brows you can easily get many more applications than the suggested number on the box. I've used this product for years and I highly recommend it. It's inexpensive and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: I've got eyelashes now and I'm stoked
customer_reviews.text: I have translucent eyelashes and I've always wondered what it would be like to wake up in the morning and have visible lashes,,, now I can! It is relatively easy to apply but in my experience it's best to apply it as heavily as possible in order for the entirety of the lashes to be covered. The dark brown color looks very natural with my medium blonde hair color and was plenty dark enough for my purposes; to have natural looking darker eyelashes, not to use as a substitute for mascara. I definitely poked myself in the eye with this product and I didn't go blind, so that's the biggest plus, honestly.
customer_reviews.author: slimeybby

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!
customer_reviews.text: So I was very skeptical to try this product because I was concerned it wouldn't work or would be difficult to apply etc. I have white blonde eyebrows and eyelashes (I'm a natural redhead) and have always just used makeup etc to color my eyebrows. Well I did my eyebrows last week and they came out great. I did have to leave the dye on a bit longer than recommended (probably 15 mins) but I didn't mind and they didn't come out too dark. I haven't done my eyelashes yet so I'll update my review once I do.
customer_reviews.author: Allison P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Much easier than 28 Day Mascara, and better results. The activator did gush out of the tube, but that may just be due to the high altitude where I live. Any color that got on my eyelids cam off easily with a wet cotton pad; it does stain fingernails, so wear gloves (or paint your fingernails after). Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ShopCat

customer_reviews.title: Loved the outcome!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED this product! I am a redhead and was going on a Caribbean vacation where I would certainly be in the water a lot. Rather than using waterproof mascara which still smudges and flakes, I tried this. It gave me much more confidence to go without makeup. I did end up applying a second time sweeping a makeup brush across my lashes as the consistency seemed hard to apply with the mascara brush. It could be because I had the mix wrong as it’s also a little tricky to count the drops of activator. I think it will be easier each time as I get used to the process.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S

customer_reviews.title: If you value your eyes don’t use on lashes!
customer_reviews.text: Great for eyebrows but for the love of mankind DON’T put this on your eyes!! I applied it to my blonde lashes and no more than 2-3 minutes my eyes were on fire (and yes I followed the instructions). I’ve used eye drops about 4 times now, washed my eyes 3 times and it’s still stinging. The skin around my eyes is turning red. BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for eyebrows not so much eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: It’s worth giving it a shot for yourself. A lot of the comments complained about the ingredients not combining well with eachother which I first experienced as well but just keep mixing and you’ll get the consistency you’re looking for. I used to tint my eyebrows but after discovering this product I will never go back to anything else. I wash my face about twice a day and this product has held up pretty well even in my brutally hot showers
customer_reviews.author: Stephany Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Being a natural redhead it’s hard to figure what to do with my blonde eyebrows when I want to stay my natural hair color for summer. My brows are a natural blonde and I like some color so I don’t look washed out. I gave this a try after watching many videos reviews in Youtube. I LOVE it! So easy to use and they literally turned out perfect! I’m so happy. You get many uses out of one bottle but I’ll definitely be getting more. You can also color your eyelashes which I intend on experimenting with next. I want to say I got the brown/brown color.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Eyelash Dye not worth 1/2 star.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to mix because when I tried to add 10 drops and turned the bottle, all kind of drops came out. It was hard to mix and it would not stay on my eyelashes. I got a little bit in my eye and it burned like hell. Why all those awful chemicals when they are so damaging to the eye? When I finally was able to apply some to my eyelashes, I left it on 15 minutes and guess what. No color on my eyelashes. A waste of money. Have to look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer JUtta Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This really works!
customer_reviews.text: Are usually go to an Aveda salon to get my eyelashes tinted. But every time I go it’s $40 plus a tip. I decided to get this product a chance it is so easy you can individually to each eyelash and I’ve already had it on for 2 1/2 weeks and it’s perfect still.
customer_reviews.author: kmccutcheon

customer_reviews.title: Great brow dye!
customer_reviews.text: This is great is you want a natural look with definition. Will color white hairs. Don't leave on too long. I do 10 to 12 minutes and it's perfect. It colors my white hairs. I have left on for 15 min and looked like Groucho Marx! I get approximately 6 uses from one box.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia J. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! I have dirty blonde hair but pretty light eyebrows and it was always annoying to have to do my eyebrows if I wanted to wear mascara. The developer/color is a bit hard to mix but WORTH IT. I used the spoolie to apply it, left it for 4 min then realized I didn’t put enough on the end of my left eyebrow so reapplied to just that part for another 2 min and voila! Perfect, natural brows! The hairs themselves are dyed rather than my skin, so it looks soo much better than powder. And despite not mixing the product perfectly, my coverage is even. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Chaves

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: I am blonde and fair skinned. I left the product on my eyebrows for 4.5 minutes to be on the conservative side. Very happy with the results & no irritation issues. The next time I use it, I’ll probably leave it on for a minute longer. Also- I have to adjust the mixture to get the consistency correct. As other comments noted, you may need to adjust how much of each product to combine for appropriate consistency.
customer_reviews.author: purplecobra90

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to mix
customer_reviews.text: It is very difficult to mix the product and the developer. I even tried mixing in a separate dish from what is provided with my own mixing brush, additional to all that is supplied within the box. It does not work well and I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi M.

customer_reviews.title: Slow Results
customer_reviews.text: My lashes have grown but very slowly. I have used the product for two months now and the lashes are longer but not long. I will say though they are healthier. Just a guess but I think the product/tube will run out in another four to six weeks, so I don't anticipate it lasting as long as claimed. If my lashes continue to grow, even at a slow pace, I will update when the product runs out. If they don't continue to grow, I will also update and back my rating down to three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I use it to tint both my brows and lashes. I also use it to tint my sisters and moms brows/lashes. The tint stays for about a month, the application process is fast and easy. I would suggest to apply the tint to your brows then after about 5 min then take some of it off the front of your brow to keep from your brows looking blocky.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Great for eyebrows- not lashes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking to dye my eyebrows for a while. I have very blonde eyebrows to the point that you really can’t see them. Plus my hair has gotten darker. This worked great. It was a bit tricky to mix but it worked really well. I was afraid they’d be too dark but the dark brown was perfect. I decided to do my lashes too and it didn’t really work on them. I wouldn’t recommend it for lashes at all. It was very wet and my lashes stuck together. It didn’t seem to work on the ends of the lashes at all. You can view my before and after photos.
customer_reviews.author: Bekx

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt dye.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered dark brown the dye was definitely not dark. More light brown than anything. I mixed the cream and liquid accordingly and it was ot mixing well. It was chunky. I applied the mixture to an area of my skin to see how I'd react.. or if it'd even dye. My skin didn't dye. So I tried my eye brows to see if it'd dye my eyebrow hairs. It did not. Not worth it. Do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha Patricia

customer_reviews.title: New product old packaging
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer has changed this product. I prefer the older one and I'm not sure why they made the change. This is harder to use. Not as effective and the color I would say is Brown but not dark brown....just frustrating that I spent money thinking I was getting one thing to get another
customer_reviews.author: lyshanda h.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried, because many others hadn't had great results. My eyebrows turned out great! I applied the dye once, following the directions in the package, and left it on for 30 minutes. The dye didn't take as well on my eyelashes. Wiped off, didn't leave skin irritation. Be careful when doing eyelashes, though. You have to be really careful. Didn't care for the little mixing wand that came with the product; it wasn't very useful. With enough patience, it got the job done. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: If I could select a zero I would. First, it was almost impossible to mix the color and developer. The textures were so thick and so watery they wouldn’t mix. I had to use a different tool to mush them together and after about 6 minutes they finally mixed. Second, it didn’t work! I followed the directions exactly for both eyebrows and eyelashes, nothing happened. Not a shade or tint different. Waste of money. My friend tried it and had the same results. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Walter

customer_reviews.title: So easy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleasantly surprised with how easy this was to use! I have Lash Boosted lashes, so they are really long and full, but mine are still just really blonde. I had them tinted several months ago by an esthetician and loved it but thought I could save some money and time doing it myself. It was so easy! I did the blue black from my lashes and the dark brown for my brows. I followed the instructions (except I left it on my lashes for 30 min) and had no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley McCracken

customer_reviews.title: and good luck with getting 10 drops out of the developer ...
customer_reviews.text: The dye was very difficult to mix with the developer; it kept clumping up. The directions are vague, and good luck with getting 10 drops out of the developer bottle, that thing drips so quickly its impossible to keep correct count. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Life saver for blonde girls
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this 3 times now and I am obsessed. I use dark brown to tint my brows/skin every week. It’s easy to mix and use. I use a thin eye brush to paint on.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywaffle

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff, great home dye kit. Wish it lasted a bit longer. It 3.5 weeks (says 4) is pretty good for a home kit.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hardie

customer_reviews.title: Don't freak out when the dye is wet eyebrows; wipe the dye off, and then see the amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! And the amount I have left is good for at least 8-10 dyes. This is so worth the money and I love my dark eyebrows with my blonde hair.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Hess

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this lash dye and followed directions to a T! It did nothing. I have been dying my eyelashes and eyebrows since I was 12 years old because I’m very blonde. (I’m 64 now). I’ve used this product before and I re-ordered it because it worked pretty well. This time I ordered “dark brown” and it did NOTHING!!! HOw about a refund?????
customer_reviews.author: Aggiemom

customer_reviews.title: Yes absolutely buy this
customer_reviews.text: So much better than me using my $2 hair dye. This is a life saver for me! No more blonde eyebrows and lashes i feel like a normal person and im feeling so confident. Of course getting it this close to the eye is going to make you water up and your eyes will be red but it was worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Vonna

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I'm ginger and this dark brown provided a nice, cool-tone brown for my brows. It came out dark but after two days it was a perfect shade. I'm pretty pleased with the results since I have bushy eyebrows, but they are blonde/invisible. This makes it to where I never have to fill in my brows. It's harder to apply to eyelashes but it's worth it for the eyebrows alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and works
customer_reviews.text: Color was as expected, and came out great! I have sensitive skin, but this didn’t affect my skin at all.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary L.

customer_reviews.title: Good for eyebrows, would not recommend for eyelashes!
customer_reviews.text: I have light blonde eyelashes and eyebrows and feel that you can never see them. While this did darken them considerably, it also sent me to the eye doctor the next morning with a corneal ulcer. I did read and follow all of the directions. I would recommend this for eyebrows but would not wish the outcome of the lashes on anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have lighter eyelash color
customer_reviews.text: At first it was hard to put on using the pads, but if you put it on like if it was mascara then it’s much easier and it won’t get into your eyes (would recommend this method of applying). I would not recommend if your eyelash color is already brown. It’s probably better if you have blond or lighter eyelash hair trying to make them darker or noticeable. I got the dark brown and my eyelash color are naturally brown so it didn’t work on me.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I have been dying my eyebrows & eyelashes for years and I've always used Julienne but I had to make a switch and I'm glad I did. I love this stuff so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Lilteich

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Will be buying again when needed. I have blonde brows and this product works wonders in getting it exactly to the shade I want. Just remember not to leave it on for too long, because it doesn’t look dark right away. Give it an hour or two and don’t make the mistake I made of trying to re-do it a few times thinking it doesn’t work. Trust me, it works; very well.
customer_reviews.author: ur mom

customer_reviews.title: Box labeled POISON!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (teen) wanted to try an eyebrow coloring kit. I did not look at the photo close enough. After it showed up, my husband opened the envelope and... It has POISON printed large on the top corner! How can they sell this??? Will be returning, unopened.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B. Wolcott

customer_reviews.title: So worth it! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had known about this earlier on in life. Literally, ten minutes out of your day (and insanely easy application) and you look prepped and ready when you wake up! Product lasts for 4-6 weeks, depending on how much you shower or wash your face.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received used product!!
customer_reviews.text: I would return this product if I could - when I finally got the time to try to tiny my lashes I opened the package and discovered it has been used. There was dye on the tray and wand and the tube had been opened and the safety seal punctured. The safety seal on the developer was also broken and the directions were missing. The protective tissues had makeup on them. Super super gross.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Is this some kind of joke? The color and developer didn’t mix AT ALL. Threw the whole thing away. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to apply and mix.
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why this gets rave reviews. Followed the instructions. The paste does not mix well with the liquid at all. Very thick and goopy. Did dye my brows but was a pain to apply. I prefer the just for men mustache kit instead. Won’t purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy! It'll be a big mistake.
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrible, and I regret purchasing it. It's completely ineffective and as many times as I've tried to give it a chance, I have yet to see a difference in the shade of my eyebrows. Please don't waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: House Skarr

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this stuff! I used it on my brows and eyelashes. Wish I would have been sent the right color on the first go but I’m thankful since when I paid to get my brows tinted they mixed black and brown. The product does last and I can redo it whenever I feel like my brows are losing their color without having to pay $30 to have someone to do it. It’s also easy to use which is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for true blondes!
customer_reviews.text: This review is written by my girlfriend who ordered this product under my account:: I love this product. My hair, eyebrows & eyelashes are very blonde, meaning you can’t see them unless I have makeup on them. Not sure why everyone is complaining about this being difficult to mix....yes it takes a few minutes but is it really that big of a deal? I bought the lightest color they have & it worked great!!! The color lasted 6 weeks!
customer_reviews.author: brian bibby

customer_reviews.title: Product came opened!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cant even give this ONE star! I only did bc it wouldn't let me submit. I just received this today. Went to use it and IT HAS BEEN USED already!!!!!! The white wand had color on it and the small tube was already popped open from the cap. There was also color running down the side of the pack where they had used the bowl. I was SO excited and ready to try this and now I have to take my time to go and return it! I will not buy another one in the brand or from this company!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not working on my brows
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my brows, I applied it for more than 20minutes, but I can't see any difference after using it! And it's really hard to count 10 drops of the liquid one because of the bottleas design!!! Will update this review after try again.
customer_reviews.author: A.HHH

customer_reviews.title: I thought this was a HORRIBLE product! I don't know if I got a ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a HORRIBLE product! I don't know if I got a bad product or if this is the actual product. The cream did NOT mix with the developer. I purchased "dark" brown and this was a light brown that never darkened. ZERO STARS!! No color change to my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Leschly

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I mixed the product as specifics and did my eyelashes first. Absolutely nothing. Not even a hint of color and it burned so bad. Tried a second time, same deal. Did my eyebrows and waited 15 minutes instead of the 6 it states. It all wiped right off like nothing. Very disappointed, and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee

customer_reviews.title: Color is Light
customer_reviews.text: I like the application of this product, it's very easy. I am disappointed in the color. I am a blonde, and like my eyebrows a dark brown. This color is a very warm, almost caramel brown. I have applied the color for up to 15 mins. and still the color doesn't darken. Other than the color, product is good and recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tessy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The product left a strange mustard tint on my eyebrow hairs I suppose that’s better than a really red under tone but I am not sure. Also product didn’t dye the full length eyelashes or get as dark as it did on my eyebrows any of the three times I tried it and lasted much longer on my eyebrows.
customer_reviews.author: CSW

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff. I have dark blond/red hair & the medium brown works amazing for my brows & lashes!! It lasts for weeks too. Very easy to apply & you barely have to use any of the product. & you can just wipe it off with water. Doesn’t burn my skin or eyes like most brown/lash dyes do. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: WH01

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: It works but....It. Burns!!! Do not get this crud in your eyes! I have blond lashes and this gives me a couple of weeks were I don't have to worry about mascara. Just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: MoonMoon

customer_reviews.title: Time saver! But a few drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! The only makeup I apply in the morning is to darken my eyebrows, so this is a time-saver! I will say that mixing the color and developer are a little annoying, as it is hard to determine the right amount of each ingredient without measuring tools. Also, I would apply it every 3-4 weeks instead of the recommended 6 weeks. Lastly, I just use an eyeliner brush to apply the product to my eyebrows (it's a lot easier than sing the application tools provided)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked well and covered grey
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact you mix the dye and solution together first. The ones where you add dye on your hairs then add solution is much more messy. This color worked great, covered grey hair.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda G

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I love the product and the outcome right after using but it doesn’t last more than a week or two. But better than having to your brows everyday. The only thing I was it had in the instructions was measurements on how much of the color and dye to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't mix enough to use..
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to receive this product, however upon arriving it was very disappointing. The color part in the tube comes out as if no problem but in reality it won't mix. Product may be too old? I'm hoping the seller reaches out and makes it right :/
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Afraid to Use it
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were so frightening I did not use it. It says don't get on your skin, don't get in your eyes.and lay down during the process. Then there is the word Poison in large letters at the top of the box. I was too afraid to use the stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolette

customer_reviews.title: I have eyebrows with this stuff... I didn't know I had before. 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: This product is an eyebrow saver! My eyebrows are pretty blonde even though the rest of my hair is dark brown. I tint my eyebrows with this awesome stuff and it keeps my eyebrows brown for a good month or so. Retouch ups every month for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Delgado

customer_reviews.title: It's Back
customer_reviews.text: Buy it now because it went away for awhile! This is my very favorite eye brow dye ever! Quit reading and buy it now! It lasts a long time too!
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I usually go to Benefit to get my eyebrows and eyelashes dyed and it costs me around $50. I have really light eyebrows and eyelashes so it's a pain to put makeup on all the time. The color in this is just right and it lasts a really long time! It was easy to apply and didn't irritate my skin. The only complaint I have is that it is a little hard to mix with the developer, but after about 5 minutes I got it to mix.
customer_reviews.author: claire moran

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. It says it’s light brown which I originally thought was going to be too light for me but it darkened after I left it for a bit. It’s perfect for a fair skinned redhead like myself.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: I used this to dye my eyelashes. Although it darkened them ever so slightly, it wasn't enough to make a difference. I did one eye at a time just so I could compare. I think you would need to have long thick lashes to begin with, then it would darken them to look like you had mascara on. Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B

customer_reviews.title: A redhead essential!
customer_reviews.text: This product was surprisingly amazing!! I have white eyelashes naturally from being a redhead. I was always so self conscious about going out without mascara, but this product has been a game changer! The dark brown looks so natural for my eyelashes and brows! I did have to leave it in for longer than the recommended time for it to be the most effective and used less of the developing drops as other have suggested. Overall great product and much cheaper than having it done at a salon!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT WORK FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: I've used several at home kits for my lashes and brows. I followed instructions but this did not dye my brows at all. I did purchase in May and waited 2-3 months to use so maybe it expires by then?
customer_reviews.author: Sara T

customer_reviews.title: Good for brows
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my brows but I do not recommend using for lashes- the one time I tried it immediately went into my eyes and burned. The developer and dye don't really "mix"- I just stir the dye in the developer for 15 or so seconds and apply it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: This stuff did not work for me - did two applications and ZIP - nothing
customer_reviews.text: I have a few white eyebrow hairs that I wanted to blend in to my otherwise-black brows, and I thought black might be too harsh so I got the brown. I mixed up one batch and applied it just as the directions said and after 8 minutes (not the 6 they suggest) I saw no difference. I mixed up another batch and waited 20 minutes after applying it with the same zero results. Is it called 1000 Hours because it takes 1000 hours to work? Well, I don't have that much time to wait. I plan to return it.
customer_reviews.author: perenniallee

customer_reviews.title: The application was easy enough but I wouldn't bother with the under eye ...
customer_reviews.text: I personally was not excited about the results. Neither was my daughter who has very light color hair (med blonde). The application was easy enough but I wouldn't bother with the under eye protectors. They were more of a pain to keep on then preventative when it came to staining your under eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn Ewald

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have blonde hair in my eyebrows and i always wanted darker hairs there. Never knew about this product before but it is a life changer! Doing my eye brows in the morning has never been easier!
customer_reviews.author: jenna

customer_reviews.title: Works great once you adjust the mixture!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this twice now and super super happy. I read one review and she altered the directions a little bit and that worked perfect. It says to add an “inch” of the dye cream but I just added a “half inch”. I add enough of the activator to make the mixture creamy, like the consistency of yogurt. I leave it on my brows for 10 mins. My eyebrows were almost nonexistent but this product totally helps!!!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: did not work
customer_reviews.text: This company 's shipping was good but the product did not work at all. I had a beautician friend do this for me and the result was no change in color at all.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Possibly expired product
customer_reviews.text: Dye would not mix with the developer. I mixed and mixed and it just separated into chunks. I may have received an expired product. Yuck!
customer_reviews.author: RayRay

customer_reviews.title: oo la la
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly but it burns my eyes so bad. I wouldn't recommend dying your own lashes without help, but I do recommend using it for your brows, my brows stay dyed for at least three months or more before I have to redo them
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not as good as previous version
customer_reviews.text: I loved the previous, 2-step version. With this version, one mixes liquid developer with gel dye. It does not emulsify easily. Perhaps if the developer was a gel, too? It works ok, though.
customer_reviews.author: Debi B

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long
customer_reviews.text: I am a redhead so I never get the shade I want with these things so I’ve given up all hope on that aspect. It’s pretty easy to use but it takes forever to mix up the dye. It’s thick and not super user friendly with the little white wand. I’ll try again in about a week when this all fades. It did stay tinted for a LONG time (like almost a full month!) that was exciting.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: I'd use it again to dye top lashes, but doesn't work for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: Worked had to make 2 attempt to dye top lashes dark enough but wouldn't dye bottom lashes no matter how long it was left on or how many times I tried. Maybe just my lash type.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Works well- was afraid it was going to be a drastic dark color - but came out perfect and I’m getting used to it after having blonde eyebrows and lashes my whole life!
customer_reviews.author: Ambrosha

customer_reviews.title: I use this on my brows and it's pretty easy to apply and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my brows and it's pretty easy to apply and long lasting. It took me a few times of trial and error to find the best and cleanest way to apply the gel. (Have cotton swabs.) It lasts about 5-6 weeks after taking about 1/2 hourish to apply. If doing eyelashes too, I'd say 45mins to an hour for careful, complete application.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra W

customer_reviews.title: I have eyebrows lol!!
customer_reviews.text: It worked great! My eyebrows and lashes are usually a light brown to blonde while I hae natural medium brown hair. This worked great and its not too dark at all with my fair skin and freckles. I used it on my eyebrows and eyelashes and let it sit for 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Megan R

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the product...I’ve been using henna for years...and usually my eyebrows are silky and go where they belong...after use this product... I can’t get my old look back...it ruined my eyebrows
customer_reviews.author: janina

customer_reviews.title: I'm so annoyed! I always use the tint kit but
customer_reviews.text: I'm so annoyed! I always use the tint kit but, thought I would give this one a try. It is the worse tint I have ever used it did nothing to color my brows. They stayed the same color. The instructions are a joke!! If I had not used this product I would have definitely sent it back. Don't waste your money!!
customer_reviews.author: cldrnjsn

customer_reviews.title: Barely noticeable results
customer_reviews.text: This product is difficult to use without assistance. Results were barely there. I was hoping for a subtle darkening of lashes, and in a sense I got that. You may have better luck with the black variant. It should be noted I did not test my brows.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very subtle results
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to apply on the eyebrows. I purchased the color dark brown. I already have dark brown eyebrows and hoped that it would dye the complete eyebrow area that color. The results were very light, subtle almost unnoticeable.
customer_reviews.author: ssmith

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t work at all.. was all dried even when mixed.. tried several times
customer_reviews.author: Monlee

customer_reviews.title: No harsh chemical smell! Less expensive than having it done.
customer_reviews.text: It's lasted a week so far on my lashes. Hard to get it evenly on the tops. Not to noticeable on the bottom lashes. Kinda stung my eye. Dont glob it on and blink alot. Hard to mix.
customer_reviews.author: They hide honest reviews on here

customer_reviews.title: I have been so happy to find this
customer_reviews.text: I have been so happy to find this! As a blonde, I don't feel 'naked' without makeup anymore when I wake up. The application on yourself is a little 'gloppy'. I found a comb-type applicator to use and this helps get the product all the way to the roots, which really matters with see-through eyelashes. I do two applications, one after the other is wiped off, to get the darkness I need.
customer_reviews.author: PDXpeople

customer_reviews.title: Chunky texture
customer_reviews.text: Would not mix! Color cream was not the color (dark brown) I was expecting. It was definitely more of a medium brown shade. Instructions say to mix 10 drops of developer but it came out of the bottle so quickly that it was impossible to count the “drops”. Did not mix well. Chunky. Had a friend apply it for me and hardly see a difference. Plus it burned. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, it doesn't mix
customer_reviews.text: First of all, be careful with the developer liquid - it pours out fast! Barely tip it in order to count number of drops. But since the color create doesn't mix after extensive mixing, I would skip buying this product all together. Maybe I just got a bad lot? my box reads "BATCH no. 5609.AU". Hopefully I'll be able to return this purchase because it's worthless. I've never had this problem with the other brand I have used for years.
customer_reviews.author: zeke Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Clumped too much to use
customer_reviews.text: This product for me was unusable due to the clumping of it, I ended up throwing it out.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended by me
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are the worst and product wouldn't even Mix. Bad experience all around.
customer_reviews.author: krystle ramos

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work on lashes
customer_reviews.text: Could see the color a little on the brows but no difference on lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best for eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all for any of my lashes that were gray. It does not adhere. No matter how many times I applied and reapplied, it would not work on my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used several products for tinting and this is one of the best!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used several products for tinting and this is one of the best!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Does not mix well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product based on reviews. I normally use a different product for my eyebrows. I didn't even get to the point of apicatiin. Spent t minutes trting to mix the cream dye with the peroxide provided. As you can see in the picture, it never fully blends to the point where I can apply. I don't feel I can apply it in its current state. Time to find a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Salls

customer_reviews.title: Completely damaged
customer_reviews.text: My package didn’t appear damaged until I opened it. The instructions and little pads were wet and it looks like ALL of the developer leaked out so the product became completely useless. Purchase at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Bean

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated this a 5 star but the mixture clumped up on me when I tried to mix it. I had to use a spoon to mash it together. After that, it worked perfectly. I have grey, hard to dye, hairs in my eyebrows. It actually dyed them. It also worked beautifully on my lashes. If it lasts as long as it claims, it will be like putting on mascara once a month. I can live with that!
customer_reviews.author: kdblaisdell

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't do anything.
customer_reviews.text: I used the dye as per instructions. It stained the skin under my eyebrows which washed off. However, I have a lot of white hairs in my eyebrows and the dye did nothings. I was very disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Emert

customer_reviews.title: It never 'developed' into an applicable cream
customer_reviews.text: The dye was as thick as toothpaste and I applied the developing drops then blended. It stayed thick but didn't seem to absorb the drops. Plus, it didn't cover as well as my old Roux dye. I miss Roux. That stuff WORKED.
customer_reviews.author: Notvested

product_meta.title: 1000 Hour Eyelash & Brow Dye/Tint Kit Permanent Mascara (Dark Brown)
product_meta.description: *All Kits include Cream Color, Developer, Applicator Wands and Mixing Cup* Whether you want darker, fuller eyebrows or eyelashes or simply want to wake up beautiful and save time in your morning routine, tinting will open up your eyes and give you more definition and thickness! Lash tinting gives your eyelashes a thick, full look without having to apply mascara daily. If you have light lashes, dying them can give them a more dramatic voluminous appearance without having to apply makeup all the time. With four colors to choose from you can tint your own eyelashes and eyebrows to match your natural color for a long-lasting look without the use of brow liner or mascara. 1000HOUR dyes are safe and effective and smug and water proof. For the men out there who want to emphasize their eyes and facial hair, 1000HOUR can be used to tint your beard, side burns and mustache. NOT TESTED ON ANIMALS! Pair 1000Hour Eyelash and Brown Dye Kit with 1000 Hour Xpress Lash -Gro Eyeliner/Growth Serum for the fullest most amazing eyelashes ever!
feature_bullets: Economical- you can treat yourself to a lash and brow color at home for a fraction of the cost of a beauty salon treatment
Permanent color for eyelashes & brows! 100% Grey Coverage
Safe & effective! Quick & easy to use!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
